content: I would like to be able to my own stuff to the temp/ _data file like I did pre-templates, but with the templates can't do it anymore. do I need to edit the scripts? @Lloyd McKenzie

Templates can create additional data files - the standard templates already spit out a couple of extras. But you need to be putting whatever you're needing into the base or HL7 template - we don't want different IGs published by HL7 having different appearance, differing authoring conventions, etc.
I want to create custom site variables and I figure others do as well ... I figured it out by the way... just added the folder input/data and put your yml/json/csv data in there
